title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography

(ii) ND/HND in Relevant discipline

(iii) Bachelor degree in relevant discipline
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' level credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other 2 subjects. For NBC holders, the other 2 relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, office Practice and Secretarial Duties.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)   Two (2) 'A' Level  passes.
(ii)  NCE merit in two (2) subjects 
(iii) ND/HND in Relevant discipline
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and three (3) of Literature in English, History, French, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, Christian Religious Studies, Islamic Studies, Geography/Physic, Economics and Government

or TC II with pass in English Language and four (4) other subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from CRK, Economics, Literature in English, Government/History.

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIORESOURCES ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.
(ii) NCE, ND/HND in Relevant discipline
utme_requirements: 5 O’ level credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology or Agric Science, Physics, Chemistry.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Agricultural Education/Science or Biology
(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)including Agricultural
(iii) ND/HND in Relevant discipline Education/Science or Biology
(iv) ND/HND in Relevant discipline
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Chemistry and any other two (2) subject.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five(5) O' level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science. Pass in Mathematics may be considered if the candidate has a credit in Physics or vice versa. The 5 credits must be obtained in not more than 2 sittings. A credit pass in Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least a pass in Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

(ii)  NCE merit in Biology and Chemistry. 

(iii) ND/HND in Relevant discipline

subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics or Mathematics.
